issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: {{FileSystemContractTestBase}} never verifies that a newly created file has a file status where {{isFile()}} returns true
fields.summary: FileSystemContractTestBase never verifies that files are files

comments.body:
Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #3520 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/3520/])
    HADOOP-9258 Add stricter tests to FileSystemContractTestBase (includes fixes for production code HADOOP-9261 & HADOOP-9265 and test enhancements HADOOP-9228, HADOOP-9227 & HADOOP-9259) (Revision 1460646)

     Result = SUCCESS
